creator: bud_weizer@yahoo.com
text:
Installed from Red Hat 8.0, Multiviews is not enabled on /. So when trying to
goto the Manual pages the server gives a 404 not found.  When enabling the
multiviews the pages are Ok.

Is this a bug or a initial config error ?? from Red Hat or Apache ??

This is a problem with RedHat's configuration. Please file a report in
bugzilla.redhat.com 
Thanks for using Apache2!
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
